channel.title: Ludvig af Klinteberg
channel.description: Recent content on Ludvig af Klinteberg

item.description: I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at the SFU math department, as part of a fellowship from the Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation’s program for mathematics. My background is in numerical analysis, with a mix of fluid mechanics, physics, and computer science. Most of my current work is focused on developing fast, high-order integral equation methods, for simulations of flows governed by the Stokes and Navier-Stokes equations.
